/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of white and beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, with their lush green foliage, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the textures and colors of the scene.
